page.title: 13OUTDOOR PASTIMES - STRANRAER
page.content: Stranraer can offer many outdoor activities being in a{rural area. One of these activities is{angling. You can go fishing in one of the five lochs which are situated near Stranraer. The fishing for brown trout is controlled by a local club which is called Stranraer and District Angling Association. There are{two bowling greens}in Stranraer. Both have public bars for club members and spectators. There is a{riding school}at Clashmahew on the outskirts of Stranraer. There are about 10 horses and foals and many quiet roads to ride along. The Rugby Club is situated on Ladies Walk. It also has facilities for squash. There are 2 squash courts, a public bar and a dance floor. There is a large playing field close to the club house.
